Articles.Content:
As seen in hooligans http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/0-22-hooligan-labs-airships/ mod you can make your vessels stationary to walk on as soon as you "save " the state and are flying in lowspeed or no speed.

Can this plugin, the save state-landed be made into a standalone little plugin? If its possible, can it be called when your in space and lets say have this little machine onboard and actoiveted?

Thanks for your time
I looked at the provided source code and I didn't see anything to that effect. You might verify that behavior and ask Hooligan Labs directly about it.
